# Command
- Follow space law, it is in your favor. - Do not use contraband as command roles unless there is an immidiate round ending threat (blob, zombies, nukies, or ascended heretic). - Do not use your equipment to validhunt, just defend yourself. - You are a high position leader for a dystopian company, you can act like it. - Be competent in your position. - You can accept bribed, just be reasonable. Nanotrasen probably wont care if you give someone engineering access, but they wont be very happy if that same person pays you for armory access.
# Head of Security - Do not coup unless it is the coup game mode.
# Quartermaser - Do not cargonia unless you are an antagonist.
# Chief Medical Officer - Do not prep deadly chemicals to use as weapons without IC reason.
